snippet: Rihanna and Pharrell Williams were among the winners at the inaugural iHeartRadio Music Awards; the Glaad Media Awards honored the actor George Takei and Netflix’s “Orange Is the New Black.”
abstract: Singers Rihanna, Pharell Williams and Lorde are among winners at inaugural iHeartRadio Music Awards in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: Rihanna and Pharrell Williams were among the winners at the inaugural iHeartRadio Music Awards; the Glaad Media Awards honored the actor George Takei and Netflix’s “Orange Is the New Black.”

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation
